channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: White House unveils letter President Donald Trump will send to new US citizens
item.description: Following the naturalization ceremony, U.S. citizens will receive a congratulatory letter from President Donald Trump.

item.title: Trump is pushing for a ‘big cut’ from the Fed today—but he’s already on a losing streak
item.description: Trump failed to oust Fed Governor Lisa Cook and is unlikely to get the steep rate cut he demands, as Powell and the FOMC weigh weaker jobs data.

item.title: 1 in 3 Americans have no emergency savings—while boomers’ $2,000 cushion dwarfs Gen Z’s $400, survey finds
item.description: Roughly one-third of Americans are not prepared for a financial emergency.

item.title: The economy is reliant on the ‘fortunes of the well-to-do’ says Moody’s—if the ultra-rich get nervy that means recession
item.description: Mark Zandi says of the rich: "If they turn more cautious, for whatever reason, the economy has a big problem."
